title: Le Pain Quotidien
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes, plus a vegan breakfast item, vegan muffin, and coffee with soya milk.
